meanings.definition: The study of electrical activity in living organisms.
meanings.sent1: In electrophysiologies, scientists analyze the electrical signals in animals.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use electrophysiologies to understand how electricity works in the body.
meanings.sent3: The class on electrophysiologies was shocking, but also enlightening.
meanings.sent4: Her fascination with electrophysiologies sparked a new interest in biology.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on electrophysiologies made the subject come alive with vivid examples.

meanings.definition: The branch of physiology that deals with the electrical phenomena associated with nervous and other bodily functions.
meanings.sent1: Doctors specializing in electrophysiologies focus on nerve-related electrical activities.
meanings.sent2: Electrophysiologies helps us understand how our body's electricity impacts our health.
meanings.sent3: The hospital's electrophysiologies department was always buzzing with activity.
meanings.sent4: His research in electrophysiologies shed light on the body's electrical mysteries.
meanings.sent5: The professor's passion for electrophysiologies was truly electrifying to his students.
